name: Dragon Adventure
description:
This is not just a skill game like flappy bird.

To be a hero in this dragon world!there are rich items included:
more than 30 swords
more than 50 hairstyles
more than 30 outfits
more than 10 faces
more than 10 dragons
Needs you find them to strengthen yourself

Currently there are level mode ,racing mode,distance mode in this fun game.

In level mode,currently there are 3 worlds,30 stages wait your challenge!
In racing mode,you can have match with NPCs,even can have racing with players in the world.
In distance mode/endless mode,you can try to fly as far as you can.

Try to play the game to create you own dragon hero!!

Thanks for everyone,enjoy,have fun.
